main event: A resident of Tangent, Oregon witnessed a large, silver, saucer-shaped object hovering about 150 feet off the ground in December 1965.
interesting points: The object was round and silver in color, about 30 feet in diameter, and made no noise.
The object hovered for several minutes before suddenly disappearing.
The witness, along with a friend, clearly saw the object, and the witness believes another local girl may have also witnessed it.
The witness reported a distinctive red glow in the sky before and after the object was sighted.
The Air Force acknowledged the witness's report and thanked them for reporting the observation.
witnesses: a local resident and their friend
